sentences.en: And the Lord said unto Cain, Why art thou wroth? and why is thy fallen?
sentences.cn: 6耶和华对该隐说:你为甚麽发怒 呢 ?你为甚麽变了脸色 呢 ?

sentences.en: But thou hast cast off and abhorred, thou hast been wroth with thine anointed.
sentences.cn: 但你恼怒你的受膏者,就丢掉弃绝他.

sentences.en: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
sentences.cn: 你竟全然弃绝我们, 向我们大发烈怒.

sentences.en: But wroth as he was, a short struggle ended in reconciliation.
sentences.cn: 虽然他很气愤, 但一阵短暂的争吵之后终归和解.

sentences.en: He was wroth to see the damage to his home.
sentences.cn: 他看到家里遭到的毁坏愤怒极了.

sentences.en: He wroth off a dirty kind of life by killing himself.
sentences.cn: 他以自杀结束了他那肮脏的一生.

sentences.en: They think you don't know the dime is wroth more than the nickel.
sentences.cn: 他们认为你不知道一角比五分值钱.

words.tran_cn: 愤怒的；狂暴的；暴风雨般的；汹涌的
